div.span: Learning at Home Resources/MS Department of Education

In accordance with the directive Governor Reeves has made concerning public schools in the state of Mississippi, the South Tippah School District will remain closed through the rest of the semester.
Frank Campbell, Superintendent

div.div:
On behalf of the South Tippah School District Board of Trustees, administrators, staff, and students, I want to welcome you to our district website. It is my hope that your visit will provide you with a glimpse of the hard work being done across our district to help us achieve our mission to properly and safely educate our students.
